title: WhatsApp cloud backups might soon count against your Google Drive storage
content:
WhatsApp backups haven’t counted against your Google Drive storage for a number of years thanks to an agreement between the developers and Google. That may be coming to an end though, as strings discovered in a recent build of WhatsApp beta suggest that soon, user backups may count against your Google Drive storage in some

The post WhatsApp cloud backups might soon count against your Google Drive storage appeared first on xda-developers.
description: WhatsApp backups might soon count against your Google Drive storage, bringing to an end years of free unlimited backups. Read more here.
